segmentosSRT.text:
Why don't you have a go?
Show them what it takes.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Your wife is right here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text:
What's with you?
Can't take "no" for an answer?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: You want to make me lose face? Go away!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: It's all in order, I'll be going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Master Fugui, don't think badly of me...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: for leaving you homeless.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Master Fugui, I'm sorry...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text:
but you've nothing left.
What would you wager?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: If you're unhappy, talk to Mr. Xie.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Not that we'd accept it as ante.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Just settle everything, okay?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: We'll settle everything then.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: It's valuable. Don't scratch it. Take it slowly.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Careful, slowly. Don't move too fast!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Don't break anything!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text:
Your mother's not well.
Go now, for her sake.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: I'll look after her for a few days?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Until you're set up elsewhere.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Want me to help you?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: A rare visitor indeed.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Master Fugui! It's been a year at least.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: This old home of yours is great.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Warm in winter, cool in summer.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Great at any price.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: I've given up the puppet troupe.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Have a seat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text:
I don't gamble anymore.
Don't want to end up like you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: I'm not one to lend money.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: I'll lend you something else. More practical.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text:
I never had to beg
when I ran the puppet troupe.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Earn your money yourself.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Put together a troupe.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Get it out of my sight then.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: It really is booze!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: He was very busy?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: They say she's great. No problems.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25

segmentosSRT.text: Good idea.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_25
